tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE rma_tracking (
    rma_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT NOT NULL,
    return_reason TEXT,
    return_date DATE,
    returned_items JSONB,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending'
);

CREATE TABLE rma_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  request_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  date_requested TIMESTAMP,
  date_resolved TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE RMA_Request (
  request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  reason TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE RMA_Return (
  return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  request_id INT NOT NULL,
  return_reason TEXT,
  return_status VARCHAR(10),
  return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE RMA_Replacement (
  replacement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  return_id INT NOT NULL,
  replacement_product_id INT NOT NULL,
  replacement_status VARCHAR(10),
  replacement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE RMARequest (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    return_reason VARCHAR(255),
    return_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE RMAResolution (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rma_request_id INT,
    resolution_date DATE,
    resolution_type VARCHAR(50),
    resolution_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RMALog (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rma_request_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    action_taken VARCHAR(100),
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RMACustomerFeedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rma_request_id INT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_score INT,
    feedback_comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RMA_Process (
  rma_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  return_reason TEXT,
  return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  product_description TEXT,
  product_price DECIMAL,
  product_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name TEXT,
  customer_email TEXT,
  customer_address TEXT,
  customer_phone TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Replacements (
  replacement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  return_id INT,
  new_product_id INT,
  replacement_date DATE,
  replacement_status TEXT
);
